## Git.exists() method

Find out whether `repoName` exists in the callback `cb(exists)`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
exists(repo: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  repo | string | name of the repo |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
